World_Map_Recolor.Description: Change the color of the farm area on the world map if you're using a recolor. May not work alongside SVE if the recolor mod itself doesn't support SVE.

World_Map_Colors_Alt.Description: When available, will use a recolor optional colors on the map. Vibrant pastoral will show red autumn grass (instead of green) & Wittily Named Recolor will show light dirt (instead of dark)

Use_Northern_Path_WaFF.Description: Add a new map between WaFF's northern exit and the Backwoods.

Use_Northern_Path_WaFFLE.Description: Add a new map between WaFFLE's northern exit and the Backwoods.

Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.Description: Either let the game decide or manually select the outside appearance of the shed to fit different textures packs.

Use_Shed_WaFF.Description: Make the abandoned shed available and upgradable when playing on WaFF. Entering it as well as the available floors will depend on your farm advancement.

Unlock_Shed_WaFF.Description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed on WaFF, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.

Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.Description: Set the abandoned shed location on WaFF.

Use_Shed_WaFFLE.Description: Make the abandoned shed available and upgradable when playing on WaFFLE. Opening it as well as the available floors will depend on your farm advancement.

Unlock_Shed_WaFFLE.Description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed on WaFFLE, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.

Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFFLE.Description: Set the abandoned shed location when playing on WaFFLE.

Shed_Planks.Description: Add planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.

Shed_Planks_Type.Description: Select the color of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars, or change them to stone.

Shed_Planks_Textures.Description: Select the texture design of the floor planks/stones adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.

Shed_Pillars_WaFF.Description: Decorate the shed's main room with support pillars. Only apply when playing on WaFF.

Shed_Pillars_WaFFLE.Description: Decorate the shed's main room with support pillars. Only apply when playing on WaFFLE.

Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Shed_F0.Description: Once available, extend the usage of casks to the entry floor of the abandoned shed instead of limiting it to the shed basement.

Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFF.Description: When playing on WaFF, set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.

Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFFLE.Description: When playing on WaFFLE, set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.
